name: 分子親緣關係學
goals: Understanding and application of molecular phylogenetics
syllabus:
Week 1: The Archaeology of the Genome

Week 2: Trees

Week 3: Genes: Organisation, Function and Evolution

Week 4: Genes in Populations

Week 5: Measuring Genetic Change

Week 6: Inferring Molecular Phylogeny

Week 7: Models of Molecular Evolution

Week 8: Applications of Molecular Phylogenetics

Week 9: Mid-tern Exam

Week 10: Edit Sequence

Week 11: Sequence Alignment

Week 12: Population Genetic

Week 13: Tree Construction I: Neighbour-Joining Tree

Week 14: Tree Construction II: Maximum Likelihood Tree

Week 15: Tree Construction III: Mrbayes Tree

Week 16: Molecular Clock

Week 17: Student Homework Presentation

Week 18: Student Homework Presentation
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
